OrgName.entry: LONGLEY HALL FARM TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Organises social events for tenants of Longley Hall Farm Estate, including Companions Club, weekly coffee morning, keep fit and craft group. Has a small library which is free of charge to use, a drop-in that is regularly attended by Police Community Support Officers, Safety Wardens and an Advocacy Worker from SOAR (see separate entry). Hosts Councillor's surgery. Also has a meeting room which serves as a meeting place for home helps and management. Holds Christmas buffet for local tenants and residents and organises 6 trips per year; 3 to the coast, one to the theatre and one to a christmas market with dinner. Projects concluded this year include; bird boxes, planters in community garden, Neighbourhood Watch Scheme, internet/email, disabled access and toilet.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Thurs 10am-12noon; 4th Wed in the month at 7pm (social activities), 2nd Wed in alternate months (TARA meetings)
